titleStmt.title: By the Quene where as the Quenes Maiestie for sondry great and weightie affayres, concerning her highnes, and the state of Her Maiesties realme, and churche of Englande, hathe ... sommoned Her Maiesties highe courte of Parliament ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi typographi Reginæ Mariæ excusum,

notesStmt.note: Directing Parliament to meet at Westminster, instead of Oxford.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
